Name: Artist
Review Text: went there with friends. We got the kebabs and falafel, and tap water. The kebabs tasted quite bad, and the falafel was very average. …

Name: Artist
Review Text: A wonderful taste of Lebanon in Amsterdam. Not only they serve the most tasteful Lebanese food one can find in town but also have such a kind, adorable and attentive team. It’s worth visiting a thousand of times! Don’t miss the babaganush and the falafel!

Name: Artist
Review Text: €50 for a mezze for 2 and this is all we got. it was overpriced for the amount of food and the taste was nothing special. I expected a lot more from a Lebanese restaurant.

Name: Artist
Review Text: It was an incredible experience that we had at ARTIST. Amazing food, beautiful place and lovely staffs. I would strongly recommend it for everyone who wants to feel a little of Lebanon. :D

Name: Artist
Review Text: Fantastic hospitality, excellent food. Lots of meat and vegetarian options. Great sharing plates. Lots of outdoor tables.

Name: Artist
Review Text: Amazing place! Delicious food, super friendly host/owner! Definitely going here more often.

Name: Artist
Review Text: One perfect evening! Delicious Lebanese delicacies served in authentic atmosphere. Service also excellent. A little pricey which you would expect with the quality comes in city like Amsterdam. Would love to go again! Next time if they have fans inside for summer ,would give 5 stars. ;)

Name: Artist
Review Text: Delicious food and amazing staff that really care if you enjoy your experience!! Cannot recommend enough :)

Name: Artist
Review Text: We loved it. Very nice food, very nice people. Don't forget to drink Turkish coffee at the end of you meal. It is fantastic and original Arabic!!!

Name: Artist
Review Text:
For more then 40 years my favourite restaurant in the heart of Amsterdam.
Lovely family running it, delicious food.

Name: Artist
Review Text: Really good Libanese food, feels home made and the price is affordable. Nice treat. Only con, you can only pay with maestro card...

Name: Artist
Review Text: You MUST go here! Amazing authentic food and the most lovely staff

Name: Artist
Review Text: My go-to restaurant. Fantastic typical Lebanese food. Falafel is the best I have ever tasted. Everything is delicious and service is very nice.

Name: Artist
Review Text:
Restaurant is nice. Service is great. Employees are great.
But I found quality of food average.
Hummous, okras were not great
Baba ganousch and tabouleh were good.

Name: Artist
Review Text: Really nice owner and amazing food, I recommend!

Name: Artist
Review Text:
We went out for dinner with friends and had a great experience with this place.
The restaurant was cosy and welcoming. The waitress was very kind and gave us great suggestions. …

Name: Artist
Review Text: A Lebanese restaurant in Amsterdam since 1977, who managed to successfully import the taste and quality of the original Lebanese cuisine.

Name: Artist
Review Text: Amazing food, nice and quick service. It's the first Lebanese I've come back to multiple times. The presentation is great, the option to have a taste of many dishes is awesome. We paid 25 eur per person for a test of,I believe, 12 different foods? Maybe it was 14. Enough to leave fully satisfied.

Name: Artist
Review Text: The most welcoming and hospitable place in all of Amsterdam. Delicious Lebanese food that transports you to Lebanon and back!

Name: Artist
Review Text:
We were very warmly welcomed and also very well served. A compliment to the attentive service.
The food was excellent and was freshly prepared. The meals were served in a …

Name: Artist

Review Text: Amazing food,must go place.Good prices.Friendly staff

Name: Artist
Review Text:

Name: Artist
Review Text: I took my sister here when she was visiting and we ate super well. The owner was incredibly nice, and it was lovely to eat outside in the summer. If you don't know what to get, just ask the staff :)

Name: Artist
Review Text:
Great food and friendly staff.

Name: Artist
Review Text: Very nice cosy restaurant. The vegetarian menu was tasty and not expensive. A good insight into Lebanese food and customs. Food was served with tasty, red, Italian wine. Definitely coming back here!

Name: Artist
Review Text: The food is delicious, best Lebanese restaurant in Amsterdam .

Name: Artist

Name: Artist
Review Text: Excellent Excellent Excellent authentic Lebanese food. Seriously the best I have ever tasted in The Netherlands. The family that runs it are so friendly and the experience we had was just more than we could ever expect. Recommend it for everyone...

Name: Artist
Review Text: The staff is the kindest, the food is delicious and decently priced. I’d definitely recommend visiting the Artist to enjoy a lovely evening!

Name: Artist
Review Text: Best Lebanese restaurant in town! Great food and people ! Raphy is the best!

Name: Artist
Review Text: Found this place out of luck while wandering around the neighbourhood and very happy we did! The food was fresh and delicious, the wine was unexpensive and the service was warm and friendly. We had a great evening!

Name: Artist
Review Text: Great Libanese food! This is a cozy family-run restaurant that serves awesome dishes for a feast that will last hours! A piece of advice: listen to the suggestions made by the owners when ordering food, you won't regret it!

Name: Artist
Review Text: The food was amazing and the person serving was extremely kind!! I had an amazing time and truly recommend visiting this place if you are after Lebanese food!!

Name: Artist
Review Text: Genuine lebanese food. Cozy place with traditional furniture and music. The menu includes a huge variety of lebanese dishes but my favorite is the menu for 2. Dessert is very tasty and not heavy. Great attending!

Name: Artist
Review Text: Lovely food and extremely nice people. We enjoyed our dinner on the terrace. The wine of the house was a perfect choice to go with the mezzes .

Name: Artist
Review Text:

Name: Artist
Review Text: Great Mediterranean food, owner is extremely nice! Sharing dish is around 21 Euro and you get a lot of food. Good value for money !
